catalogue_raissonne: Hind prisons 09 ii/iii, F.32, Robison 35 vi or vii/viii
creditline: The Martha T. Wallace Memorial Fund, 1930
provenance: Erbach-Erbach family, Schloss Erbach Hofbibliothek, Erbach (Odenwald), Germany. F. H. Bresler Gallery, Milwaukee, Wisc.
text: Though commonly called a giant wheel, the round object in this etching is a huge circular window opening into another space.
title: The Giant Wheel
